OpeningBracket.description: Defines the opening bracket style, this is often a [.

ClosingBracket.description: Defines the closing bracket style, this is often a ]

TextMarker.description: This is used as a placeholder for text. For Example [O] you should specify a blob character such as \u25CF. Set this to 'Legacy' if you want to use the original Wingdings Blob

ShowMessages.description: Displays a message when the search has reached the end or the beginning of the document.
